main event: Multiple witnesses reported seeing a bright orange, saucer-shaped object hovering before it disappeared at a high rate of speed.
interesting points: The object was first noticed coming down from about 80-100 feet off the ground., Witnesses described the object as being the size of a baseball held at arm's length., It emitted a whistling sound but did not produce much noise., The object disappeared over the horizon, heading east., The conditions were partly cloudy and visibility was 15 statute miles.
